column3: There are currently application-wide settings for: (1) the path to the git executable and (2) the choice of ssh executable.  This change honors those existing settings, but allows individual projects to choose to override them.

I believe this also fixes/addresses these related issues:
https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-120335
https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-175515

Without regressing on this closed issue:
https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-66127
Note:  I have signed the contributors agreement (see #637 )

Thank you for your help, @mkillianey
Unfortunately there's a problem with the approach you suggested - not many users know about "default project" setup, so setting up application-wide executable can become a pain in the neck.
We have come up with a slightly different approach that allows to "override" current application-wide setting via a checkbox and will implement this shortly.
Allow projects to override the path-to-git and ssh preference on a pe¡­
